## Packages

```{r pacakages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(here)
here()
```

```{r import}
raw_data <- read_csv(here("raw_data/road-network-traffic.csv"), skip = 7)
```

```{r look}
raw_data %<>%
  select(-1)
raw_data
```
